properties.value: curl -SL "https://www.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-8/v8.0.14/bin/apache-tomcat-8.0.14.tar.gz" -o tomcat.tar.gz 	&& curl -SL "https://www.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-8/v8.0.14/bin/apache-tomcat-8.0.14.tar.gz.asc" -o tomcat.tar.gz.asc 	&& gpg --verify tomcat.tar.gz.asc 	&& tar -xvf tomcat.tar.gz --strip-components=1 	&& rm bin/*.bat 	&& rm tomcat.tar.gz*
